articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il from AINDF
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il from AINDF
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory message from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on Monday on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The birth of the leader as son of Mt. Paektu meant a great fortune of the nation as it promised a bright future of Juche Korea and an auspicious event of world historic significance as it opened a bright prospect of the human cause of independence, the message said, and continued: 
					
					 You are a peerlessly brilliant commander of Songun who has performed immortal exploits before the country and nation, the times and history by leading the Juche revolutionary cause to victory for half a century and a peerlessly great man who enjoys boundless and absolute trust of progressive mankind.
					
					 Your personality as a peerlessly great man and the outstanding leadership you have provided for translating the gigantic plan for building a reunified and great prosperous and powerful nation into a reality by giving full play to the mental power and potential of the servicepersons and people in the DPRK built up with Songun convince the people from all walks of life in south Korea of a bright future of the country to grow rich and powerful.
					
					 It is the greatest fortune and the highest honor of the Korean nation to hold in high esteem you deeply respected and highly praised by all Koreans and the international community for having paved the way for the nation and the times to follow and performed immortal exploits to shine in the history of the country with his ever-victorious political caliber and outstanding Songun politics.
					
					  The message expressed the resolution of the vanguard fighters of the AINDF and patriotic people from all walks of life to staunchly struggle as participants and persons of merit in building a reunified powerful nation, remaining single-mindedly true to the leadership of the leader.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory message from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Feb. 16 on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The message said that Kim Jong Il is the most prominent political elder and a peerlessly brilliant commander of Songun in the present times who has performed immortal feats before the country, the people, the times and the history by leading the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence to the victory for the last half a century. 
					
					 You have performed exploits by building a prospering socialist land of bliss on this land through gigantic creations and changes and opening a new chapter in the confrontation with the U.S. and the cause of the country's reunification with your preeminent strategy and matchless courage and they are recorded in the human history to shed rays all over the world, the message said, and went on:
					
					 You have shown all sorts of profound loving care for Chongryon and the Koreans in Japan after embracing them as members of a family since you left your giant footprints for carrying forward and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, and wisely led Chongryon to set an example as a pioneer in the overseas compatriots movement in the world at every phase of history.  
					
					 The message manifested the determination of Chongryon and the Koreans in Japan to share minds and breathe the same breath with the people in the homeland giving full play to the inexhaustible mental power and great potential true to Kim Jong Il's magnificent plan for building a great prosperous and powerful nation and thus glorify this year as a year of a turning point in laying a solid foundation for ushering in a new heyday in the movement of the Koreans in Japan. 
					
					 We will conduct brisk external activities to force the Japanese authorities to lift the sanctions against the DPRK and stop their moves to suppress Chongryon and improve the DPRK-Japan relations and preserve Chongryon's legitimate position as required by the prevailing situation, the message concluded.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il from Overseas Compatriots
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il from Overseas Compatriots
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a congratulatory message by members of congratulatory groups, delegations and visiting groups of overseas compatriots on Feb. 16 on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The congratulatory message said:
					
					 The sacred cause of national independence started by President Kim Il Sung has been firmly carried forward despite all challenges and difficulties in history as the DPRK is holding you, an illustrious commander born of Heaven and a peerlessly great man in history, in high esteem as the sun of the nation and the dignity and national power of Kim Il Sung's nation are being demonstrated on the highest level. 
					
					 We overseas compatriots are highly proud of the immortal feats performed by you who have ushered in a heyday of the greatest prosperity in the history of the nation, frustrating the imperialist allied forces' every move to stifle the DPRK with your unique Songun politics.
					
					 Our homeland is demonstrating its prestige and dignity before the whole world at a time when many countries are seized with uneasiness and fear due to the imperialists' aggression and arbitrary practices and catastrophic consequences of the worldwide financial crisis. This is the shining fruition of the great patriotic devotion of you who have made tireless efforts for the country and nation only.
					
					 We will smash every move of the anti-reunification forces and positively  reenergize the national reunification movement under the slogan of "Advance dynamically along the road of independent reunification under the banner of the June 15 Joint Declaration and the October 4 Declaration!" and more dynamically work to make a tangible contribution to building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation, keeping pace with the people in the homeland making a dynamic advance in the sky-high spirit of making a charge and creative mettle.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Indonesia
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Megawati Soekarnoputri, chairwoman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, sent a floral basket to the DPRK embassy in Djakarta on Feb. 12 in congratulation of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place in different parts of the country Monday on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 They staged dances in different places of Pyongyang including the plazas of the Party Founding Memorial Tower, the Arch of Triumph and the April 25 House of Culture to the tunes of songs "February Waltz" and "Please Accept Bouquets." 
					
					 Youth and students also presented beautiful dances to the tunes of songs "Our General Is the Best" and "It Is Thanks to Songun Enforced by the General" with the boundless reverence and the best wishes to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They renewed their firm determination to give full play to the heroic stamina and courage of the Korean youth in the present general advance, the theatre of the young people, in hearty response to the call of the Party, dancing to the tunes of "We Will Hold Our General in High Esteem" and other songs. 
					
					 On the same day, similar events took place in provincial seats, cities and counties including Hyesan, Sinuiju, Sariwon and Hamhung.

articles.title: Music and Dance Performance Given to Celebrate February 16
articles.content:
Music and Dance Performances Given to Celebrate February 16
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A music and dance performance to celebrate February 16 was given by the Mansudae Art Troupe at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre Monday on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 It was appreciated by senior officials of the party, army and state, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, ministries and national institutions, labor innovators, working people in Pyongyang, congratulatory groups and delegations of overseas compatriots and overseas Koreans, and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys of foreign countries and staff members of foreign embassies and representatives of international organizations here and foreign guests.
					
					 The art performance began with female solo and chorus "Cantata to Comrade Kim Jong Il". The repertoire included orchestra and chorus "General Is the Destiny of Korea", dance "Old Home Clad in Frostworks" and female solo "Greeting Spring at Foot of Jong Il Peak".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the sacred revolutionary history and great feats of Kim Jong Il who rose up as the bright star of Mt. Paektu and ushered in a new era of prosperity unprecedented in the history of the Korean nation while leading the revolutionary cause of Juche to victory and glory with his extraordinary wisdom, outstanding leadership and matchless grit and pluck.
					
					 Meanwhile, concerts were given by artistes of the State Symphony Orchestra and the Orchestra of the Yun I Sang Music Institute and the revolutionary drama "Woman Comrade of Mt. Paektu" was staged by artistes of the State Theatrical Company and there was an acrobatic performance at various theatres here on the same day.
					
					 Art performances were also given at provincial art theatres and city and county houses of culture including North Hamgyong Province, North Hwanghae Province, Kangwon Province and North Phyongan Province Monday on the same occasion.

articles.title: National Meeting of Korean Children's Union Organizations Held
articles.content:
National Meeting of Korean Children's Union Organizations Held
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A national meeting of the Korean Children's Union organizations was held at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Feb. 16 to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Attending it were delegates of the union from provinces and its members in Pyongyang.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop and officials concerned, officials concerned and party and youth league officials, war veterans and persons of merits in Pyongyang.
					
					 Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, said in his report at the meeting that the birth of Kim Jong Il as the son of guerrillas in Mt. Paektu, the sacred mountain of the revolution, was great fortune of Korea and a great auspicious event of the nation that heralded the bright future of the revolutionary cause of Juche. With this historic February the Korean people could advance along the road of victorious Songun while being blessed with the illustrious leaders through generations, he added.
					
					 The reporter extended the warmest congratulations and the highest glory to Kim Jong Il, who has defended the beautiful dreams and future of rising generations, carrying deep reverence of all the union members.
					
					 A ceremony of joining the KCU took place at the meeting.
					
					 Led by Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, pupils to join the union took an admission oath in front of the KCU flag.
					
					 Officials, war veterans and persons of merits put red ties around the necks of new entrants and badges on their chests.
					
					 Then, congratulatory speeches were made by Kim Tong Chun, a war veteran, Dr. Jon Sung Guk, associate professor of Kim Chaek University of Technology, and Hero of the DPRK Jong Song Ok who is People's Sportswoman.
					
					 They called upon all the union members to firmly believe in and follow Kim Jong Il always and anywhere and prepare themselves to be true sons and daughters of Songun Korea with ample knowledge, high morality and strong body, true to the oath made in front of the KCU flag.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Shows Open
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Shows Open
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Kimjongilia shows are going on in all provinces on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 On display there are potted immortal Kimjongilias, cultivated by officials and working people of institutions, factories and enterprises of the provinces with profound reverence for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Opening ceremonies were held in the provinces.
					
					 Attending the ceremonies were leading officials of the local party, power and economic organs and working people's organizations and working people.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Children's Camping Begins
articles.content:
Children's Camping Begins
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The first-term camping for this year began at the Jangjasan Children's Camp in Jagang Province with due ceremony Monday on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 All the campers from different parts of the country will learn from the boyhood of Kim Jong Il and consolidate what they have learned at schools and train their bodies and minds through different hobby group activities and diverse sports and cultural activities during the camping.
					
					 The reporter and speakers at the ceremony spoke of the joy at having an opportunity to spend pleasant camping days at the above-said camp which has turned into an excellent centre for school children's after school education thanks to the great care of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The ceremony was followed by a march-past of campers and an art performance given by teachers of the camp.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets President of IJF
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets President of IJF
 Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with Ladislau Marius Vizer, president of the International Judo Federation, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.

articles.title: Mongolian Delegation Here
articles.content:
Mongolian Delegation Here
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the National Agency for Meteorology, Hydrology and Environment Monitoring of Mongolia headed by its Director-General Enkhtuvshin Sevjid arrived here today.

articles.title: KCNA on DPRK's Right to Space Development
articles.content:
KCNA on DPRK's Right to Space Development
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Recently the U.S. and some other countries claimed that the DPRK is making "preparations for launching long-distance missile."
					 It is a grave challenge to the DPRK that the anti-DPRK hostile forces spread the rumor about the DPRK's "preparations for launching a long-distance missile" with the "collected information" without proper understanding of the fact.
					
					 This is a vicious trick to put a brake on the wheel of not only the DPRK's building of military capability for self-defence but also scientific researches for peaceful purpose under the pretext of missile.
					
					 One will come to know later what will be launched in the DPRK.
					
					 Space development is the independent right of the DPRK and the requirement of the developing reality.
					
					 The DPRK's latest science and technology developing day by day in conformity with the trend of the present times when the world is advancing toward the road of pioneering space have registered big successes in the field of space development, too.
					
					 Dishonest forces are asserting that the DPRK is doing provocative deed in order to draw attention from anyone. But, such assertion itself is an insult to the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK has no need to draw anyone's attention and wants nobody to interfere or meddle in the issue of the Korean Peninsula where only the Koreans live.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities' Move to Cover up Tragedy in Ryongsan under Fire
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities' Move to Cover up Tragedy in Ryongsan under Fire
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A rally took place to remember the slain evacuees in Ryongsan in front of Seoul Railway Station on Feb. 14 with more than 10,000 people from all walks of life attending, according to south Korean MBC.
					 The participants in the rally denounced the prosecution for playing upon words, paying lip service to the investigation into the tragic incident in Ryongsan.
					
					 They were greatly angered by the fact that "Chongwadae" issued an instruction to cover up the "tragedy in Ryongsan".
					
					 At the end of the rally, they staged a demonstration.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il' Exploits Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il' Exploits Praised by Foreign Figures
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) --The immortal exploits performed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il were praised by political figures of various countries.  
					 Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, in a statement issued on Feb. 4 on the occasion of the birthday of Kim Jong Il said that the DPRK is winning one victory after another and ushering in a new heyday, remaining undeterred by any challenge of the imperialists and manifold trials as it is led by Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Recalling that Kim Jong Il has developed Kim Il Sung's dignified Korea into an invincible socialist fortress, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, and wisely led the human cause of independence against imperialism and of world peace with his great Juche idea and outstanding Songun politics, the statement stressed that his undying exploits will remain shining forever. 
					
					 The chairman of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party in a statement issued on Feb. 10 noted that Kim Jong Il's leadership is the greatest guidance in the world history of politics and his feats are the great exploits performed by the outstanding leader guiding the struggle of not only the Korean people but humankind for achieving global independence against imperialism. 
					
					 He expressed firm belief that the DPRK's cause of socialism and human cause of independence against imperialism are sure to triumph thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was brought out in booklet by the Russian Association for Friendship and Cooperation with Foreign Countries. 
					 The work published on October 2, Juche 84 (1995) has served as an immortal great programme for party building and activities as it reviewed with pride the glorious history of the WPK which paved a new path for building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicated the way of developing the WPK into the eternal party of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Mexico
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A national seminar on the subject of "Building a free and prosperous new world under the banner of independence" took place in Mexico on Feb. 6 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed in the venue of the seminar were famous works of the peerless great men, photographs showing their immortal exploits and books and photographs introducing the shining successes made by the Korean people in building a great prosperous powerful nation. 
					
					 Present there were figures of political parties and organizations including the People's Socialist Party, the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism, the Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Friend Association for Memory of President Kim Il Sung and the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association and masses. 
					
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party, said in his congratulatory speech made at the seminar that the key to the steady victory of Korean-style socialism even under the complex international situation lies in that Kim Jong Il has wisely led the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people holding high the banner of Juche, the banner of Songun. 
					
					 Ramon Jimenez Lopez, chairman of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism, said in his report that the WPK and the Korean people have embodied the Juche idea, the Songun idea under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, turning the country into an invincible socialist fortress, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-defensive in national defence, which the U.S. imperialists dare not invade. 
					
					 Speakers deeply explained and proved the essence, validity and vitality of the Juche idea, the Songun idea, adding that the reality of the DPRK proved the immutable truth that only when a country holds high the banner of independence can it build a free and prosperous new world while frustrating the aggression, interference and arbitrary practices of the imperialists.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days to Be Celebrated in Tunisia
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Holidays to Be Celebrated in Tunisia
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee to commemorate the Day of the Sun and February 16 was formed on Feb. 10 by the Tunisia-Korea Friendship Association.
					 The secretary general of the association was elected chief of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the period of commemoration till April 15 and decided to hold colorful events in the period.

articles.title: February Holiday Celebrated in Cuba
articles.content:
February Holiday Celebrated in Cuba
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A celebration meeting took place in Cuba on Feb. 12 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Attending it were officials of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples and an agro-stock enterprise and masses of the people.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Juan Jose Leon Vega, first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, said at the meeting that Kim Jong Il is leading the building of a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation in the DPRK to victory by pursuing the Songun politics true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Under his leadership the Korean people are advancing full of confidence in victory, overcoming all difficulties, the speaker noted, adding that they would certainly achieve the reunification of the country though the U.S. and the south Korean "government" are laying obstacles in the way of reunification.
					
					 He declared that the said committee would as ever fully support the Korean people's struggle.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que con motivo de su cumpleanos (16 de febrero) le dirigiera el dia 14 Raul Castro Ruz, segundo secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba.
					 El remitente le desea de todo corazon al destinatario exitos en su labor y buena salud.

articles.title: Acto nacional de organizaciones de Union de Ninos de Corea
articles.content:
Acto nacional de organizaciones de Union de Ninos de Corea
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 16 en el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang el acto nacional de las organizaciones de la Union de Ninos de Corea (UNC) para festejar el cumpleanos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					 Participaron en la ocasion los representantes de la UNC de todas las provincias y miembros de la misma entidad de esta capital. 
					
					 Fueron invitados Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, y otros funcionarios, funcionarios del partido y la Union de la Juventud de esta capital, veteranos de guerra y hombres benemeritos.
					
					 El primer secretario del CC de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, Ri Yong Chol, dijo en el informe de la ocasion que el hecho de que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il nacio como hijo de la guerrilla en el Paektu, monte sagrado de la revolucion, fue la gran fortuna de Corea y gran jubilo nacional que anunciaron el brillante futuro de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					  Continuo que gracias a aquel febrero historico, el pueblo coreano pudo recorrer por el camino del triunfo del Songun disfrutando de generacion en generacion de la fortuna de contar con excelentes lider y general.
					
					  En reflejo de la unanime veneracion de los miembros de la UNC de todo el pais, el orador expreso las mas calidas felicitaciones y rindio la maxima gloria al Dirigente quien defiende el sueno y el futuro hermosos de los miembros de la nueva generacion. 
					
					  En el conclave se efectuo la ceremonia de ingreso a la UNC.
					
					  Los alumnos aspirantes tomaron juramento ante la bandera de la UNC siguiendo la voz-guia del secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jung Rin.
					
					  Los cuadros, veteranos de guerra, hombres de benemeritos pusieron a los ingresados las panoletas rojas e insignias de la UNC.
					
					  Pronunciaron las palabras de felicitacion el veterano de guerra Kim Tong Chun, el Doctor y Subprofesor de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, Jon Sung Guk, la Heroina de la Republica y Deportista del Pueblo, Jong Song Ok. 
					
					Ellos encomendaron a todos los ingresados que siendo fieles al juramento hecho ante la bandera de la UNC, sigan y confien absolutamente en el Dirigente en todo el tiempo y dondequiera que esten y se preparen como hijos fieles a la Corea del Songun dotados de ricos conocimientos, nobles virtudes y buena salud.

articles.title: CNCDP denuncia a los belicistas de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CNCDP denuncia a los belicistas de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ATCC) -- Recientemente, mientras hablaba de la "reaccion inmediata" a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el comandante de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea abogo por fundar la "comandancia de las fuerzas aereas conjuntas" Sur de Corea-Estados unidos y por perfeccionar el nuevo "plan operacional" que hara las veces del "plan operacional 5027" trazado para desatar la guerra nuclear contra el Norte de Corea. 
					 Al mismo tiempo, dijo que la comandancia del octavo ejercito de sus tropas ocupantes del Sur de Corea no saldra del suelo surcoreano aun despues del traspaso al ejercito surcoreano del "mando de las operaciones en el tiempo de guerra".
					
					 Ademas, EE.UU. y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos anuncian abiertamente que el nuevo "plan operacional" se aplicara a partir de las maniobras militares conjuntas "Ulji Freedom Guardian" previstas para el mes de agosto que viene.
					
					 Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz  (CNCDP) publico la vispera la siguiente declaracion:
					
					 Las susodichas palabras devienen la imperdonable y belicista declaracion de confrontacion y de guerra que representa el intento de los belicistas estadounidenses de atropellar por via militar a la RPDC y ocupar para siempre el suelo surcoreano.
					
					 Si EE.UU. desea de veras la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana, tendra que cumplir los deberes que le corresponden como signatario del Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea y responsable del surgimiento del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					 Debido a las imprudentes acciones de los belicistas norteamericanos, van ahora de mal en peor las ya muy tensas relaciones Norte-Sur y resulta una cuestion de tiempo el estallido de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					 Pero, los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos deben saber bien que no pueden amedrentar a la RPDC con ninguna amenaza o provocacion.
					
					   Al reflexionar sobre las consecuencias catastroficas que causaran sus maniobras conflictivas y belicistas anti-RPDC, EE.UU. debe revocar su politica hostil a la primera y retirar ahora mismo a sus tropas agresoras del territorio surcoreano.

articles.title: Nace en Tunez comite preparatorio para efemerides coreanas
articles.content:
Nace en Tunez comite preparatorio para efemerides coreanas
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ATCC) -- Quedo constituido el dia 10 en la Asociacion de Amistad Tunez-Corea el comite preparatorio para el Dia del Sol (15 de abril, cumpleanos del Presidente Kim Il Sung) y el 16 de febrero (cumpleanos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il).
					Como presidente de la entidad naciente, fue electo el secretario general de la asociacion referida.
					
					La entidad decidio organizar diversas actividades conmemorativas y de festejo hasta el 15 de abril que viene.
